comment.body:
Service offers methods to check if the current user has a required authorization. The service supports a role based security concept as well as object passed permissions. In order to manage the roles and object permissions of users and organizational units the AuthorizationAdminService has to be used.
If JEAF Security is enabled for a service, a special service invocation listener will call this service to ensure that the user has the required authorization (based on a roles and authorization types per method.). If a service implementation wants to use object permissions these have to be checked programmatically. The combination of role based and object based permissions is possible.
